description.value:
Favored Weapon @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Morningstar]{Morningstar}

The Order of the Godclaw's Hellknights see their cause as a holy mandate from the Godclaw. They seek to punish criminals with a zeal rarely matched by others who enforce the law.

Lesser Benefit @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Dedication to the Five]{Dedication to the Five}

Greater Benefit @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Blessings of the Five]{Blessings of the Five}
